Package graph

Class LabyrinthGraph<T>

java.lang.Object
Graphs.GraphList<T>
graph.LabyrinthGraph<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of vertices stored in the labyrinth graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graphs.GraphADT<T>
public class LabyrinthGraph<T> extends Graphs.GraphList<T>
Graph representation for the labyrinth game.

      public void addCorredor(T vertex1, T vertex2, EventoCorredor event)
      Adds an undirected edge between two vertices, associating the same event with both directions.
      Parameters:
      vertex1 - the first vertex
      vertex2 - the second vertex
      event - the corridor event to associate with this edge

      vertex2 - the second vertex
      Returns:
      the EventoCorredor associated with the corridor

      public Lists.ArrayUnorderedList<T> getVizinhos(T sala)
      Returns all neighbours of a given vertex as a list.
      Parameters:
      sala - the vertex whose neighbours are requested
      Returns:

    • setCorredorEvento

      public void setCorredorEvento(T vertex1, T vertex2, EventoCorredor novoEvento)
      Updates the event of an existing edge, replacing the previous value.
      Parameters:
      vertex1 - the first endpoint of the edge
      vertex2 - the second endpoint of the edge
      novoEvento - the new edge event to set

      Relocates a trap from the given edge to a random safe edge.
      Parameters:
      v1 - the first vertex of the original edge
      v2 - the second vertex of the original edge
